results.question: What kind of software development projects can be executed by Scrum Project Management Framework?
results.correct_answer: All kinds of software development projects

results.question: What does NOT belong to cornerstones of the agile manifesto?
incorrect_answers: Individuals and interactions over processes and tools
Responding to change over following a plan

results.question: What is defined by the Scrum Framework?
Where are the customer requirements stored?
incorrect_answers: In a Scrum Product Requirement Specification
Nowhere. The Scrum Product Owner knows them

results.question: Which ones of the following main roles are defined by Scrum Framework?
Which ones of the following main events are defined by Scrum Framework?
Which concept is NOT defined in the Scrum Framework?
What is important in all Scrum projects?
In software engineering what are the disadvantages of the classical waterfall model?
results.correct_answer: End-Product has to be fully anticipated beforehand
incorrect_answers: Some requirements are implemented as defined in the beginning of the project, and yet they are not really needed by the customer.

results.question: What are the advantages of the Scrum Framework?
results.correct_answer: Fine-grained requirements are only defined when they are really needed.
incorrect_answers: All activities to design, build and test a certain functionality are kept together in one phase.
Changes are expected and welcomed by Scrum team.
